subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry was so desperate to make the Ryder Cup team that he was willing to skip the U.S. Open whose course, he said, was not a good fit for his game.
snippet: Kenny Perry was so desperate to make the Ryder Cup team that he was willing to skip the U.S. Open whose course, he said, was not a good fit for his game.
